headline: Clinical Communication & Collaboration Market by Platform, Component, Application, End User - Global Forecast to 2030 with Cisco Systems, Oracle, Baxter, Avaya, Spok Leading
summary: The global clinical communication and collaboration market is set to reach $5.31 billion by 2030, growing at a CAGR of 13.02%. This growth is fueled by the increasing need for real-time communication, care coordination, and workflow efficiency in healthcare. A surge in mobile, cloud-based platform adoption and a shift to integrated, secure communication drives this expansion. headline: Baxter’s New Decentralized Model Tests Earnings And Valuation Expectations
summary: Baxter International (NYSE:BAX) has announced a major organizational transformation with a new decentralized operating model. The company is also adjusting its board structure following mixed Q4 2025 results and ongoing operational challenges. The changes are part of a broader effort to address earnings underperformance, margin pressures, and efficiency efforts. Baxter International, a global medical products and therapies company, is reshaping how its business is run by pushing more...
